duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute the operational strategy and direction for the geo/regions/districts supported.
Communicate effectively across the business operations ecosystem and sales segments to drive operational excellence on business initiatives.
Partner with cross-functional teams and act as a subject matter expert for key issues such as quoting, pricing, compensation, and deal approvals.
Manage territory and quota process for headcount changes and ensure quota coverage and governance.
Manage the forecast and reporting process for the geo/regions/districts supported.
Build reports and dashboards to track key metrics and KPIs to increase performance visibility and analyze the health of the business.
